name: snow-cloak
description: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.
short_description: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.
